name: Cat Pin, Black & Pink
description:
Our Cat pins are a special collaboration between Draw Me A Lion and Victoria based mould-maker extraordinaire Arron Rossner. Each pin is cast, painted and assembled by hand! Made out of sturdy plastic. 
••••••••••••••••••••
Please note that due to the handmade nature of these pins each one varies slightly making it just a little more special. 

Size of each pin: 1.5"x1.5" inches
Size of pin with packaging: 2.5"x3"

name: Fun Flags Colouring Book
description:
80 various sized fun flags to colour in, cut out and glue onto sticks. Or tape them to some nice twine and make bunting for your room! 
•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••

Colour cut-out and play! It's a ton of fun and sure to promote creativity in anyone from 4 to 104. 

• 10 Wooden sticks included! So you can play right away.
• 80 Flags to colour & cut out. 
• size: 8.5x11 inches, 20 pages.

Ships in a padded protective mailer.

name: Mask Colouring Book
description:
Who will YOU turn into? 
A cat? A lion? A train conductor, a princess or maybe even the sun? Choose from ten double-sided masks to colour and put on! 
•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••

The Mask Colouring book contains 10 fun reversible masks (that's 20 fun characters!) to colour cut-out and play! It's a ton of fun and sure to promote creativity in anyone from 4 to 104. 

• Elastics included! So you can play right away.
• Masks eye & nose holes are measured specifically to fit kids. Hurray! 
• size: 8.5x11 inches, 20 pages.

Ships in a padded protective mailer.

name: Colour Me, Party Invites
description:
It's a Party and what better way to make sure it's going to be a Great one than by Colouring in your Party Invites Yourself? 

Wee ones will have fun colouring in these 12 fun designs and getting to decide who will be invited by what funny animal. And hey, there's nothing wrong with you doing the exact same thing! After all, it's Your Party!

name: Colour Me, Sticker Pack
description:
Know what's even better than just regular stickers? Awesome stickers that you can colour YOURSELF!

This super fun, super cute sticker pack comes with 20 different sticker designs that you can colour to your heart's content with markers, coloured pencils or crayons! 

Sticker pack designs can vary, so you can have fun trading with your friends if you get them one too!

name: Summer Time, 12x16 Print
description:
This ode to Summer started as a just-for-fun watercolour on my porch. It's fun and playful, but I think the colours capture that saturated Summer haziness in the late afternoon when the sun is still there but you can feel the day starting to turn into night. 

Looks beautiful in an Ikea wood frame and matches the creme colour of the Ikea matting to a T. Perfect combination.
••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••• 
Draw me a Lion, high quality digital print on premium acid free environmentally friendly stock. Unframed print fits standard frames and comes sealed in a glossy sleeve. Shipped flat in a rigid mailer.

DIMENSIONS: 
12" x 16" 
(Dimensions include a 0.5 white border for framing) 
We make framing easy! 
Fits perfectly into a 30cm x 40cm Ikea "Ribba" frame (without matting) or looks great in the bigger sized 40cm x 50cm Ikea "Ribba"using the pre-cut matting the frame comes with.

name: Story Activity Kit with 12x16 "Forest Surprise" Print
description:
The Story Activity Kit is something we are especially proud of. It includes a mischievous looking poster, an activity book designed to make it fun and easy to create an accompanying illustrated story, as well as a cute little booklet in which you can write and draw your finished story. The result is your very own illustrated story book to accompany your poster. 

Designed with kids in mind, this activity is clever enough to be of interest to anyone, ages 4-104 who might feel a tad intimidated by writing, or simply needs a little kick-start to get creative.
